channel.title: crdt on Dominic Mulligan
channel.description: Recent content in crdt on Dominic Mulligan

item.title: Accepted paper at IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems
item.description: I am please to announce that the paper “A highly-available move operation for replicated trees” has now been accepted for publication at IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS). This is joint work with Martin Kleppmann, Victor Gomes, and Alastair Beresford.
